title: BRIEF-Ginebra San Miguel Says Fine Imposed On Unit
text:
BRIEF-Ginebra San Miguel Says Fine Imposed On Unit

Stock Markets 43 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 09:40)

BRIEF-Ginebra San Miguel Says Fine Imposed On Unit Oct 15 (Reuters) - Ginebra San Miguel Inc :

* GINEBRA SAN MIGUEL INC - FINE IMPOSED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF

ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES-POLLUTION ADJUDICATION BOARD

ON UNIT

* GINEBRA SAN MIGUEL INC - FINE AMOUNTING 1 MILLION PESOS



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX2KhRQR

Further company coverage: GSMI.PS





BRIEF-Ginebra San Miguel Says Fine Imposed On Unit
